thread.section_title: GameSeek Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.gameseek.co.uk | 9 of 278
thread.title: Chris Harding

author: Chris Harding
title: Chris Harding
text: I was a bit dubious as i'd not heard of the company before and the price they were selling the game at was much cheaper than shops and other online retailers were buy I thought I'd give it a go anyway. I'might so glad I did as they were excellent. Game delivered quickly and fast emails telling me about the order and delivery status. Definitely a company i'll use again.
